title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Work experience

09/2022–present Junior editor

Journal of Statistical Software

04/2022–07/2022 Visiting PhD student

University of Copenhagen
Supervisor: Prof. Jonas Peters

03/2020–present: PhD candidate in computational biostatistics

University of Zurich, Zurich University of Applied Sciences
Supervisor: Prof. Beate Sick, Prof. Torsten Hothorn

11/2018–08/2019: Research assistant

Functional Genomics Center Zurich, University of Zurich, ETH Zurich
Supervisor: Dr. Witold Wolski

01/2017–08/2018: Research assistant

University of Freiburg
Supervisor: Prof. Oliver Schilling




Teaching Experience

Student supervision

3 Master students at UZH/ETHZ

STA406 Generalized Regression (UZH, FS19/20/21)
STA408 Statistical methods in epidemiology (UZH, SS20)
STA402/MAT924 Likelihood inference (UZH, FS19)
Introductory practical in physical chemistry for molecular medicine (ALU, SS18)



Awards and Scholarships

12/2021: GRC Travel Grant (Unviersity of Copenhagen, Host: Prof. Jonas Peters)
2015–2020: Full scholarship of the Academic Foundation of the German People
2015–2020: Full scholarship of the Lion’s Club Viersen e.V.

title: About me
text: Thank you for visiting my website, and please feel free to explore and learn more about my research. You can reach out to me via Twitter or email.

title: Lucas Kook
text:
Lucas Kook
Welcome to my academic personal website!
I am a PhD student in biostatistics at the University of Zurich supervised jointly by Professors Beate Sick and Torsten Hothorn. My research interests are combining distributional regression models with deep learning approaches and causal inference to improve treatment decisions for acute ischemic stroke patients.
Thank you for visiting my website, and please feel free to explore and learn more about my research. You can reach out to me via Twitter or email.
